title: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A delicious classic pizza with mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A rich pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

title: Sushi Platter
description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls with fish, rice, and seaweed.

title: Burger with Fries
description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and cheese, served with crispy fries.

title: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta with grilled chicken, garlic, and Parmesan cheese.

title: Tacos
description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, salsa, cheese, and lettuce.

title: Pancakes with Syrup
description: Fluffy pancakes topped with butter and maple syrup.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled with herbs and lemon.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Toasted bread topped with mashed avocado, salt, and pepper.

title: Beef Steak
description: Tender grilled beef steak served with garlic butter and herbs.

title: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake with a moist interior and creamy frosting.

title: Fruit Salad
description: A fresh and colorful mix of strawberries, blueberries, and oranges.

title: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta with beef, cheese, and tomato sauce, baked to perfection.

title: Ice Cream Sundae
description: Vanilla ice cream topped with chocolate sauce, whipped cream, and a cherry.
